msbt.message: Hey, I was wonderin' I'm pretty sure I dropped a pouch of important stuff around here. You seen it?
I'll go look for it!
Haven't seen it.
You ever drop a pouch filled with real important stuff and then have to beg a friend to find it?
I'll find it for you!
Nope, never.
! Where is it?!I'm talkin' about my special pouch, kiddo. It's lost! And I'm lost without it!
I'll go find it!
Uh, good luck...
I'm in a real bag here, kiddo<10_4 /> Whaddaya mean, that's not a real expression?! Anyway, it's relevant, 'cause what I'm lookin' for is my special bag! Can you help me find it?
Sure, I can do that.
Sorry. Good luck.
So I was readin' this book that I just couldn't put downand then I put it down ONE TIME and it's lost! I gotta know what happens next! Can you help me find it?
Sure, why not?
I can't help you now.
So I was readin' this whodunit book and I was JUST about to find out who done it 'Course I went and left it sittin' around somewhere and now I can't find it.
I'll help investigate!
I hope you find it!
I, uh, seem to have misplaced my planner, .Now, it was mostly empty, but I did scribble down a great openin' line for my novel
I'll go find it!
Sorry. Good luck.
I can't seem to find my notebook Have you seen it around anywhere?It's about yea big and it's filled withwell, never mind what it's filled with!
I'll go find it for you!
I'm sorry.
Whew, that's great. <10_4 />Just bring it straight to me when you find it and don't look inside, OK?
, that's great!I hope you don't have to go out of your way, but, uhdo please search every square inch of the island.
You serious?! Well, that'd be a HUGE help!Would you mind bringin' it straight to me as soon as you find it? I'm desperate here, .
Wow, thanks a bunch!I'll just rest easy, then. Be sure and bring it straight to me when you find it, OK? No questions asked.
Ah, well. I guess I'll just keep on lookin'
Well, I'm sure it'll turn up somewhere or another
Gah! I can't rest until I've found it
Well, thanks for that. I'm gonna need it
Yeah? Great! Bring me anything that vaguely fits the description just in case, OK?
Great! Now, don't go TOO far outta your way, but, uhdefinitely search every square inch of this island!
You serious? , that would be so helpful.I'll try and write the rest of the novel on the clanky ol' typewriter in my brain while I wait
Wow! Thanks a bunch, kiddo.Now remember, there's no reason to look inside. None.
Ah, well. If I don't find it soon, I'll just start over. It's good enough to read twice anyway!
Guess this is one mystery I'll have to solve myself
If someone else finds that planner, finishes the book, and sells the movie rights, I'm gonna be furious!
Well, probably for the best anyway. If that poetry fell into the wrong handsI mean I didn't say poetry! You said it!
Hey, can I bend your ear for just a moment?<10_4 /> I can't find my carryin' pouch. Have you seen it? I'm just sick thinkin' that I've lost it forever
I'll go look for it!
I haven't seen it.
Now where did I drop that pouchYeah, yeah. I shouldn't have dropped it in the first place. But I did, and now it's gone forever!
Maybe I can help...
Sorry, good luck.
Whoa, you'd do that for me?That'd be a big help. Much appreciated, kiddo!
Ah, well. My pouch, my problem, I suppose. Now where did I drop that durned thing
Really? Well, that's awfully neighborly of you.Just bring it straight back to me if you find it, OK? No dillydallying or fiddlin' about!
Yeah, yeah. Ooh, all this lookin' around is makin' the old neck flare up.
Hey, you're on a walk, right? And you're keepin' your eyes open while you walk, right? Well, how about puttin' them eyes to use for me by lookin' for my lost planner?
Sure, I'll look for it.
I can't right now.

Alright, keep this on the down low, would ya?I dropped my planner around here somewhere and it's filled with my proprietary brainthoughts! I don't want anyone else readin' 'em! So can you help me find it?
Sure, I can help.
Sorry, good luck.
Aww, you're the best, kiddo.Just keep it a secret if you find it, OK? 's planner is for only!
I gotcha. Your eyeballs are already committed to somethin' else. Thanks anyway, kiddo.
You serious? Alright, well, if you can keep a secret, then I'd be mighty appreciative. Just bring it on back here with your eyes clamped shut, OK?
Alright, that's probably for the best, anyhow. With any luck, it's already been destroyed.
